2124.subject: MIT
2124.descrlong: Examines venture formation and growth following completion of a high-tech business plan. Focuses on ongoing marketing, decision making, accounting and financial management, and human resource management issues. Students examine start-up and growth management issues faced by real-life technology-focused ventures, and meet with entrepreneurs, small business lawyers and accountants, and investors. Students also receive guidance on approaching potential sources of capital.
